patthana18.22:4.1: Sārammaṇaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasārammaṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.22:4.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.22:5.1: Sārammaṇaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanārammaṇo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.22:5.2: Anārammaṇaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanārammaṇo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.22:5.3: Sārammaṇaṃ nahetuñca anārammaṇaṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca naanārammaṇo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.22:5.5: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … purejāte āsevane ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.22:6.1: Nocittaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanocitto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.22:7.1: Cittaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.22:8.1: Cetasikaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacetasiko nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.22:9.1: Cetasikaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naacetasiko nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.22:10.1: Cittasampayuttaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacittasampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.22:11.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.22:12.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacittasaṃsaṭṭho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.22:13.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.22:14.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.22:16.1: Cittasahabhuṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasahabhū nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.22:18.1: Cittānuparivattiṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittānuparivattī nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.22:20.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.22:22.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.22:24.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.22:26.1: Bāhiraṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabāhiro nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.22:27.1: Ajjhattikaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naajjhattiko nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.22:28.1: Noupādā hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanoupādā nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.22:28.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.22:29.1: Upādā nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noupādā nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.22:29.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … purejāte āsevane ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.22:30.1: Upādinnaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinno nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.22:31.1: Anupādinnaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinno nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana18.22:31.4: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … āsevane ekaṃ … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate cattāri.
patthana18.22:32.1: Upādinnaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanupādinno nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana18.22:33.1: Anupādinnaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinno nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana18.22:33.4: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … āsevane ekaṃ … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate dve.
